definition: (archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The white sand bank resides a Wei meet functionary as well on the spot.
sentences.chinese: 白沙洲居委會工作人員亦在現場。

sentences.english: Aunt Chen from the neighborhood committees often helps to resolve disputes among the dwellers.
sentences.chinese: 居委會的陳大媽經常爲大家排憂解紛。

sentences.english: Secondly, we must make clear the scope of responsibilities between the community committees and other community organizations.
sentences.chinese: 二要劃清社區居委會與其他社區組織的職責範圍。

sentences.english: It was two years ago and I was working for the Committee of Gong Shou Li Community, Feng Yuan Street.
sentences.chinese: 兩年前，我接觸到廣州市逢源街公壽里社區居委會。

sentences.english: The residents committee system was established along with the socialism political power establishment.
sentences.chinese: 居委會制度是隨着社會主義政權的建立而建立起來的。

sentences.english: The city of Miami has a neighborhood known as Little Haiti.
sentences.chinese: 邁阿密市有被稱爲小海地個居委會。

sentences.english: "Benevolence supermarket" establishes in the community to reside the Wei meet third floors, from community unity superintendence.
sentences.chinese: “愛心超市”設在社區居委會三樓，由社區統一管理。

sentences.english: Jurisdiction of 10 district offices, 115 neighborhood communities.
sentences.chinese: 轄10個街道辦事處，115個社區居委會。

sentences.english: Matt Katz assures me that the American neighborhood is alive and well.
sentences.chinese: 麥特卡茲保證，我認爲美國居委會是活的和好。

sentences.english: Area residents have a community of 21, more than 130 resident units.
sentences.chinese: 轄區內有社區居委會21個，駐地單位130餘個。

definition: subdistrict office/neighborhood official/an official who works with local residents to report to higher government authorities
internal affairs/domestic affairs/family affairs/(trad.) affairs within the palace
to report to one's superiors/to appear in the news/to reply to a letter
Lufeng county level city in Shanwei 汕尾, Guangdong
Yanpu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Chaochou town in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
to escort (goods or funds)/to convey under guard
